comments.en:
Henryk's Ghostscript driver for the 7000 and related Lexmark Color Jetprinters.

Fast and less memory consuming alternative to the "pbm2l7k" colour driver. You should have it installed when you do not only use your printer for images but also for letters and listings.

This driver is not maintained any more, but it is part of ESP Ghostscript. So install ESP Ghostscript to get the driver.
